title: Trofo
author: Trofo
created_time: June 09, 2022, 07:49:43 PMLast edit: June 01, 2024, 12:13:13 PM by Trofo
content: Livecasino.io is a Crypto-friendly Casino where the best of both online casinos and brick-and-mortar casinos meet. Our live casino has some of the best dealers with an excellent variety of games and up to 20% monthly cashback! Play the best casino games with interactive dealers on Livecasino.io and make sure to join the 99 Club for a daily chance of winning 1 Bitcoin.Campaign Information:The campaign will be run by Cro2 team (Trofo and cryptofrka).This will be a long-lasting campaign with planned duration of a minimum of 6 months.To prove the company’s seriousness, 2 months’ worth of funds have already been escrowed (18k$ in current BTC price). The escrowed funds are already under our control and can be seen at the following wallet address. Code:bc1qrajyse6qjt2w8a8qnjmetdh9fhafxf6x0fgsf5d6x6gvjgnkl3js9p2qknAs the campaign progresses more funds will be escrowed, and we can guarantee that every campaign member that fulfils the requirements will receive full payment until the end of the campaign.Regular campaign payments will be sent to submitted users’ BTC wallets (SegWit) on Monday for previous week’s posts and an additional bonus of 60$ weekly will be given out to the best campaign participants of our choosing. These bonuses can vary and could be extra cash rewards or some free spins on LiveCasino.io accounts - we will shuffle these rewards as we see fit. If a rewarded user does not have an account, he will still be eligible for the reward - we will just ask the user to create an account.Eligibility and payment terms:We will accept up to 20 Sr. Member or above participants with the following payrates:Senior Member, Hero Member, Legendary and Staff = 4$ per post => max 25 posts equalling 100$ per week Edit 10.04.2023. Campaign has been downsized to 10 members with intent to secure campaign longevity and keep best posters connected to the Livecasino brand as long as possible.Rules:1. You do not have to wear signature and avatar while applying but removing either at any point during the duration of the campaign will get you removed without any payment. 2. Modifying your signatures or using custom URL’s is not allowed.3. There is no minimum number of posts that need to be written. We will pay up to 25 posts per week. Cut-off time is Sunday at 7 PM forum time.4. Posts that aren't in proper English, aren't constructive or are under 150 characters long will not be counted. Local boards are excluded from that rule but posts written there will be checked by Google Translate and will be disqualified if they are low-quality or spam. 5. We will accept max 30% of posts in Local threads (example: if you wrote 15 posts and 7 of them are in Local threads, we will accept only 2 – because 8 posts are in English and 30% extra amounts to 2.4).6. Posts in Altcoin boards, Archival, Games and Rounds, Investor Based Games, Micro Earnings, Politics and Society and Off-topic will not count, as well as posts written in topics where no signatures are visible.7. The posting quality will be thoroughly checked – posts in spam mega threads, campaign threads (including this one), necro posts and low-quality posts will not be counted. 8. Expect detailed post control and if you are aiming for maximum payment plan to write a few posts above the maximum quota to be sure 25 will be accepted. 9. Spamming or burst posting will cause you to be removed without payment.10. We reserve the right to disqualify any post, for any reason towards payment. If needed, we will provide evidence as to why the posts weren’t accepted. It will be done publicly if challenged, to provide all campaign members with a clear understanding of what kind of quality the campaign requires.11. Enrolling multiple accounts will result in all your accounts removed without payment, and all accounts will be flagged. Receiving negative trust feedback from DT1 or DT2 users may cause you to be removed without payment. 12. We encourage all users to report cheating and if the reports turn out to be correct, a bonus of 100$ will be paid to the person who provided indisputable evidence of cheating.13. We reserve the right to remove anyone, for any reason, at any given time from the campaign or to change the rules of the signature campaign at any point. We do however guarantee that the campaign will last for as long as the escrowed funds are not spent with no big changes in general campaign rules. 14. Any changes in campaign rules will be clearly communicated to all enrolled members.15. If accepted, it is your responsibility to check the details in the spreadsheet. Providing inaccurate data or incorrect BTC address might mean you will not receive payment.16. Gambling topics (especially casino related threads) are naturally of most interest to our client and users that were posting in these sections before campaign started will have priority during selection. To apply, reply with the following form:Code:Username:Post count:BTC address (SegWit):Livecasino.io username:*Livecasino.io username isn’t a requirement, but we will give out some bonuses to chosen members to their accounts. You can create the accounts later if you become eligible for these bonuses.Signature codes:Sr MemberQuote from: Sr Member██████████████████████████████████████████████████████⬤⬤ LIVECASINO.io  │  Play
